title: Chat Service
body: Is anyone else experiencing problems when logging into the chat service? Everything else seems to work well - I can enter champion select, games, etc. but for whatever reason can view nothing on my friends' list and cannot type to teammates.

replies.body:
This is currently a widespread issue on NA at the moment. We've been investigating into the cause and will be posting updates [here](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/).

Let me know if you have any questions.
